resources.string: Welcome to the readings page! There are fields below to enter the chemical readings of the different elements within the water of your pool and/or spa. Once filled, a rating will be given for each reading based on the entry.
Congratulations on opening the pH card! This is where we will store basic info regarding the pH level of a pool or spa.
Congratulations on opening the Alkalinity card! This is where we will store basic info regarding the alkalinity level of a pool or spa.
Congratulations on opening the Chlorine card! This is where we will store basic info regarding the chlorine level of a pool or spa.
Congratulations on opening the Cyanuric Acid card! This is where we will store basic info regarding the cyanuric acid level of a pool.
Congratulations on opening the Calcium Hardness card! This is where we will store basic info regarding the calcium hardness level of a pool or spa.
Congratulations on opening the Phosphate card! This is where we will store basic info regarding the phosphate level of a pool.
Congratulations on opening the Temperature card! This is where we will store basic info regarding the temperature of a pool or spa.
This is a test; hopefully we can get this to work
